Sentencas: The anisotropy of anionic conductivity in a mixed conductor oxide (La2NiO4+delta) with the 2D K2NiF4-type structure was measured on a high-quality single crystal.
Titulo: Anisotropic ionic transport properties in La2NiO4+δ single crystals

Sentencas: We report measurements of the oxygen diffusivity parallel and perpendicular to the [001] direction, from 450 to 900 degreesC, using the technique combining isotopic O-16/O-18 exchange and secondary ion mass spectroscopy (SIMS) spectroscopy.
Titulo: Anisotropic ionic transport properties in La2NiO4+δ single crystals

Sentencas: The diffusion is about one to two orders of magnitude higher in the (a,b) plane when compared to the perpendicular direction.
Titulo: Anisotropic ionic transport properties in La2NiO4+δ single crystals

Sentencas: The activation energy of the diffusion measured in the (a,b) plane is close to the one (E-a similar to 0.9 eV) measured in the ceramics and in agreement, as expected, with a mechanism involving the interstitial oxygen O-i(2-) as major diffusing species.
Titulo: Anisotropic ionic transport properties in La2NiO4+δ single crystals

Sentencas: This prevailing mechanism may explain, at least partly, the good efficiency of such materials when used as cathodes in solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) devices.
Titulo: Anisotropic ionic transport properties in La2NiO4+δ single crystals

Sentencas: Although the diffusivity parallel to the [001] axis is small, its activation energy is about four times weaker (E-a similar to 0.25 eV) than the one observed in the (a,b) plane.
Titulo: Anisotropic ionic transport properties in La2NiO4+δ single crystals

Sentencas: This result is in agreement with a non-stoichiometry model involving anti-phase boundaries in such materials, which induce the stabilization of oxygen vacancies in the NiO2 layers.
Titulo: Anisotropic ionic transport properties in La2NiO4+δ single crystals

Sentencas: The corresponding proposed mechanism involves the transfer of smaller O-i(-) species, with a low concentration but a high mobility.
Titulo: Anisotropic ionic transport properties in La2NiO4+δ single crystals

Sentencas: Furthermore, electronic conduction seems to play a key role in this mechanism.
Titulo: Anisotropic ionic transport properties in La2NiO4+δ single crystals

Sentencas: Finally, we measured a low anisotropy for the values of the surface exchange coefficients.
Titulo: Anisotropic ionic transport properties in La2NiO4+δ single crystals
